item.title: Hugo Learning Notes
item.description: Install Install hugo brew install hugo hugo version Create a New Site hugo new site sillyhat-hugo Add a Theme cd sillyhat-hugo cd themes git clone https://github.com/giraffeacademy/ga-hugo-theme.git echo 'theme = "ga-hugo-theme"' >> config.toml Add Some Content hugo new A.md Start the Hugo server hugo server -D Navigate to your new site at http://localhost:1313/ Properties
